description:
A loop around the Cypress (paid) trails to the peak and back down - with a great view on the top.  A nice leisurely cruise, some moderate terrain (Cypress calls some of the trails diamonds) - any moderately fit person should have no real problem.
Self guided tours run from 9:30am to 4:30pm with rentals available on site if needed.
directions: Take the Cypress Bowl exit to the Cross Country ski area
title: Cypress SnowShoe Loop
